In this digital age, do you think modern inventions have made our lives simpler, or more complex and dangerous? Discuss with examples…

MODERN INVENSION CURSE OR BOON

    Invention is something new to the world. The economy development depends upon the new inventions and discovery. Modern invention in this present era has changed the things more flexible. For instance, the use of computers from the time of its invention, the activities of human have become more easier and simpler where it has changed the total world through its advantage of using it.

     We can say the technology is the great invention which made the human activities more easier and simpler. For example,  the invention of mobile phones with the latest features enables the user to engage in other things similarly to carry his/her professional work. Even though, there are the things which may cause some hazardous to the health, but the proper utilisation helps in solving those complex issues.

     The use of technology has drastically changed from the past decade. Due to the modern inventions, the use of technology has become important in solving the complex issues. For example, the use of modern inventions in the technology has undergone  solving the problems in the medical sector where the technology helped the doctors to make complex operations or surgeries easier.

      The invention of new things to the society has become more advantage to the human enabling to lead the life happy  and simpler without struggling by use of past things. we can say the present era with inventions has build in things satisfying the human needs, wants and desire. We can say the invention of social networking sites have made people in connecting with their friends, relatives, etc be in touch with them which is saving their time rather than  meeting them directly.

         For instance, the day begin, the use of human needs or wants are satisfied through the modern use of technological inventions. At the same time, there are some disadvantages which may cause problems to the society or the human.  For example, if we consider the use of technology has a great advantage in every aspect to develop the country by the same time the misuse of it leads to destroy the world.

         Thus, the inventions has the great importance in making the things easier, simpler, better, and faster but it also have some disadvantage  which may destroy the  things. The proper control and utilisation enables in to control such conditions.
